author: Ariana Eunjung Cha, Lenny Bernstein, Ariana Eunjung Cha, Lenny Bernstein
title: Coronavirus: New York hospital forced to use one ventilator on two patients
description: 'There's no physician, including myself, who believes this is ideal. This is a doomsday idea,' says professor of emergency medicine
content:
A New York hospital is putting two patients at a time on ventilators intended for one, a stopgap move that reflects the desperate shortage of lifesaving breathing devices during the coronavirus pandemic.
The procedure has never been studied in humans. It was… [+7689 chars]
